message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering its worth $10,000 to you.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but I'm only willing to pay $10,000. That's my absolute maximum, and I'm sure we can find common ground.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm still looking to get a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair price, considering its value to you and my initial offer.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still sticking to my initial offer of $10,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the fact that I'm willing to purchase it now. Let's close the deal.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $10,000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm offering the product to you for $11,500. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
